text.text: We've received your Marpipe template request for *{{ $json.brandName }}*!  :inbox_tray:

Your request will be processed through <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xG4s7C3jUo6iuZGiFUgP91QXVCmKXslyx4EY6hYkmKs/edit#gid=414700308|Creative Sprint Planning>. The template will receive a job name, and you will be notified when it is ready for review. :working-on-it:
To track performance results back to this template, *ensure the job name (template name) is included in the ad name* for any Marpipe ads launched using this template.  :bar_chart:
